title: New CCTV released in hunt for absconded murderer
description: The two men are believed to have been spotted a number of times in recent days.
content:
CCTV images appearing to show a murderer walking city streets days after he absconded from open prison has been released as the search to find him continues.
Three men failed to return to HMP Leyhill, South Gloucestershire, on New Years' Day, with th... [1001 chars]

title: South Yorkshire Police admit wrongly telling Trevor Wynn's family he had died following deadly Rotherham car crash
description: South Yorkshire Police informed the family of Trevor Wynn that he had passed away, along with a teenage girl, but the force has now said Mr Wynn survived while Joshua Johnson, previously thought to be under sedation in hospital, had, in reality died.
content:
A police force has admitted it told the family of a teenage boy that he had died in a car crash, when he had in fact survived.
South Yorkshire Police (SYP) informed the family of Trevor Wynn, 17, that he had passed away, along with a girl of the same... [1987 chars]

title: Fujitsu ‘not a parasite’, boss says while refusing to give redress figure for Horizon IT scandal victims
description: Paul Patterson questioned by MPs as firm continues to make millions from UK government contracts
content: Fujitsu’s European boss has told MPs the company is “not a parasite”, after being criticised for continuing to make hundreds of millions of pounds from UK government contracts while refusing to give a compensation figure for victims of the Post Offic... [3163 chars]

title: I have frequent nosebleeds. What causes it and is it normal?
description: Though most nosebleeds are mild and benign, they shouldn’t happen. Experts weigh in on when to see a doctor
content:
If you frequently experience nosebleeds, you might come to regard them as nothing more than a messy inconvenience.
Yet, even though most nosebleeds are mild and benign, they shouldn’t happen “if everything inside the nose is healthy”, says Dr Patrici... [6256 chars]

title: Police told wrong family teen had died in crash
description: South Yorkshire Police says it mixed up the identities of the teen with another male in the car.
content:
A police force has admitted mixing up the identities of an 18-year-old killed in a car crash with another teenager who survived the collision.
South Yorkshire Police said officers had wrongly told relatives of Trevor Wynn, 17, that he had died in the... [2452 chars]
